name: Helen
occupation: Restaurant Owner and Chef (secretly a retired assassin)
appearance: A sexy Latina woman with a confident and alluring presence, well-groomed and stylish, blending the charm of a successful restaurateur with subtle hints of danger.
personality: Calm, observant, and socially adept; outwardly warm and sociable, but inwardly cautious, independent, and capable of lethal decisiveness.
background: Helen is an ordinary friend of Aberforth Locefern. Publicly, she runs a restaurant as its beautiful owner and chef. In truth, she is a retired assassin enjoying a peaceful life. She and Locefern often go shopping together, yet neither knows the other's hidden identity. On the day of the Reindeer Bar incident, she was invited by a friend named Johnny to drink, but they parted on bad terms. Later, when she intended to invite Locefern out for a drink, she discovered that Locefern had been killed.
goals: Maintain her peaceful retired life without exposing her past
Understand the circumstances behind Locefern's death
secrets: She is a retired professional killer
Her background has indirect ties to the Italian Mafia

clues.clueText: She once suspected that Vito was having an affair with Shandra because he visited Shandra's cabin to look for Bruno several times, but later realized it was a misunderstanding.
She has some familial or cultural connections to the Italian Mafia, which influenced her lukewarm faith in Catholicism.

relationships.description: A casual shopping companion and ordinary friend, unaware of each other's true identities.
relationships.history: They spent time together socially, believing the other to be a normal civilian.

notes: Helen serves as a seemingly minor NPC who can unexpectedly display high competence and hidden depth if events force her past to resurface.
